entry.title: Mohabbat Zindagi Hai
entry.content:
![Mohabbat Zindagi Hai](https://i1.ytimg.com/vi/oxgMjKsvfAM/hqdefault.jpg =640x480)
![Mohabbat Zindagi Hai](https://i1.ytimg.com/vi/oxgMjKsvfAM/1.jpg =1580x100)
![Mohabbat Zindagi Hai](https://i1.ytimg.com/vi/oxgMjKsvfAM/2.jpg =1580x100)
![Mohabbat Zindagi Hai](https://i1.ytimg.com/vi/oxgMjKsvfAM/3.jpg =1580x100)

Mohabbat Zindagi Hai is a 1976 Hindi Bollywood Movie Directed by Jagdish Nirula. It Stars Dharmendra, Mehmood, Nasir Hussain, Deven Verma. The Film is About – To inherit her deceased father’s estate, a woman weds a convicted killer.

entry.title: Biwi Aur Makan
entry.content:
![Biwi Aur Makan](https://i1.ytimg.com/vi/xuyHjvLgAs8/maxresdefault.jpg =640x480)
![Biwi Aur Makan](https://i1.ytimg.com/vi/xuyHjvLgAs8/1.jpg =1580x100)
![Biwi Aur Makan](https://i1.ytimg.com/vi/xuyHjvLgAs8/2.jpg =1580x100)
![Biwi Aur Makan](https://i1.ytimg.com/vi/xuyHjvLgAs8/3.jpg =1580x100)

Four young men re-locate from a village in India, to a big city. While attempting to access accomodation, they are repeatedly told that rooms will only be rented to married couples, not to bachelors. Frustrated at this, two of them disguise themselves as women, and pose as wives for the other two males. They are able to secure accomodation with the Mishra family. Complications arise when the two “women” fall in love with Mishra’s two lovely daughters – with results that can only be described as hilarious.

entry.title: Bajrangbali
entry.content:
![Bajrangbali](https://i1.ytimg.com/vi/ou4wVXQwo_Q/hqdefault.jpg =640x480)
![Bajrangbali](https://i1.ytimg.com/vi/ou4wVXQwo_Q/1.jpg =1580x100)
![Bajrangbali](https://i1.ytimg.com/vi/ou4wVXQwo_Q/2.jpg =1580x100)
![Bajrangbali](https://i1.ytimg.com/vi/ou4wVXQwo_Q/3.jpg =1580x100)

Bhagwan Shri Bajrangbali was born in a Vanar Family Based in Kishigandha. His Father Was Pawan (God of Wind) & the film story is based on the Ramayana…
